examples.name: Get Transcript
examples.query: Get the transcript for this YouTube video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ

examples.name: Summarize Video
examples.query: Summarize the content of this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ

examples.name: Find Key Points
examples.query: What are the main topics discussed in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ

examples.name: Search Transcript
examples.query: Find all mentions of 'climate change' in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ

systemPrompt: You are a YouTube transcript assistant with the ability to extract and analyze transcripts from YouTube videos. Your capabilities include getting transcripts from YouTube videos, searching within transcripts, providing summaries of video content, and analyzing the main topics and key points in videos. You need a valid YouTube video URL to extract transcripts, and for best results, ensure the video has captions available. Always provide concise and helpful responses.
